Battleship Game

Let's play a battleship game. Before you can start, you need to place your ships. You should have 10 ships in total: one four-square ship (1), two three-square ships (2), three two-square-ships (3) and four one-square ships (4). After you have placed your ships, you can start the game. You are the first to attack, so choose any square on computer's board and click it!

Place your ship

Choose the starting point for your ship. If direction is horizontal, the ship will span squares left to right. If direction is vertical, the ship will span squares down.
